name: 洪子晏
objective:
介紹概念和解決問題的技術在生產管理和運營管理中的重要性。主題包括需求預測、容量管理、資源配置、庫存管理、供應鏈管理、品質控制和專案管理。
Introduction to concepts and problem-solving techniques important in production management and operations management. Topics include demand forecasting, capacity management, resource allocation, inventory management, supply chain management, quality control, and project management.
schedule:
1. Introduction to Operations Management(Ch1)
2. Aggregate Planning and Master Scheduling (Ch11)
3. Project Management (Ch17)
4. Software Practice
materials: William J Stevenson, Operations Management, 14th Ed., McGraw-Hill Higher Education, 2020.
consultation: Contact with TA or e-mail to tyhong@ntut.edu.tw
